scripts.clean-css: cleancss -o src/css/mystyle.min.css src/css/mystyle.css && cleancss -o src/css/main.min.css src/css/main.css && cleancss -o src/css/normalize.min.css src/css/normalize.css
scripts.start: npm install && npm run css-build && npm run clean-css && node build.js production
scripts.start-dev: npm install && npm run css-build && node build.js dev
